TextBlock.Text: ORZYA: Imagine a point that exists at the average point of all star systems in this cluster.
ADONSONIA: A point? How would I imagine that? I propose that the average point is represented by our current class study specimen.
ORZYA: Imagine this average point to be represented by an anglerfish named Ernesto.
ORZYA: Assume that Ernesto can only appear within the sphere of influence (which has a radius of 2500 meters) around <Color=orange>Heliocenter</Color>.
ADONSONIA: I never finished this mathematics problem that Orzya assigned to us. I don't like mathematics, so I'm sending it to space. Farewell!
ORZYA: If it means that you'll participate in mathematics for once, then we can make that addition.
